# Initialize the canvas
canvas = Canvas()

# Set a global description for the canvas
canvas.set_global_description(
    description='A Disney 3D cartoon-style image of a small dog wearing a red hat, with blue eyes and white fur.',
    detailed_descriptions=[
        'The image showcases a small dog rendered in a Disney 3D cartoon style, characterized by its playful and charming appearance.',
        'The dog is wearing a bright red hat, adding a touch of whimsy and personality to its overall look.',
        'Its eyes are a striking blue, giving it a unique and endearing expression.',
        'The fur of the dog is predominantly white, soft and fluffy, contributing to its adorable appearance.',
        "The background is simple and uncluttered, ensuring that the focus remains on the dog's charming features.",
        'The lighting is soft, enhancing the cartoonish and friendly atmosphere of the image.',
    ],
    tags='Disney, 3D, cartoon, dog, small dog, red hat, blue eyes, white fur, whimsical, charming, playful, endearing, soft lighting, uncluttered background, adorable, friendly, unique expression, bright red hat, fluffy fur, character design, animation',
    HTML_web_color_name='white',
)

# Add the dog wearing a red hat
canvas.add_local_description(
    location='in the center',
    offset='no offset',
    area='a medium-sized square area',
    distance_to_viewer=1.5,
    description='The dog wearing a red hat',
    detailed_descriptions=[
        'The dog is positioned centrally, wearing a bright red hat that adds a playful and whimsical touch to its appearance.',
        'The hat is slightly oversized, with a small black band around the base.',
        'The dog’s fur is white and fluffy, giving it a soft and cuddly look.',
        'Its eyes are a striking blue, full of life and curiosity.',
        'The overall design of the dog is reminiscent of classic Disney characters, with exaggerated features that make it look endearing and friendly.',
    ],
    tags='dog, red hat, central position, white fur, blue eyes, playful, whimsical, cuddly, Disney, cartoon, character design, exaggerated features, endearing, friendly, small dog, bright red hat, fluffy fur, central position, lively eyes, black band',
    atmosphere='The atmosphere is playful and whimsical, with a touch of charm.',

    quality_meta='High-quality rendering with attention to detail in character design.',
    HTML_web_color_name='red',
)

# Add the dog's fluffy white fur

    location='on the left',
    offset='slightly to the upper',
    area='a small vertical area',
    distance_to_viewer=2.0,
    description="The dog's fluffy white fur",
    detailed_descriptions=[
        "The dog's fur is depicted as soft and fluffy, with a bright white color that stands out.",

    tags='dog fur, fluffy, white fur, soft texture, plush, realistic, cartoonish, detailed, individual strands, bright white, cuddly, approachable, contrast, red hat, striking appearance, meticulous rendering, charming, detailed fur, Disney, 3D cartoon',
    atmosphere='The atmosphere is soft and cuddly, adding to the charm.',

    HTML_web_color_name='white',
)

# Add the dog's bright blue eyes

    location='on the right',
    offset='slightly to the lower',
    area='a small vertical area',
    distance_to_viewer=2.0,
    description="The dog's bright blue eyes",
    detailed_descriptions=[
